Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Novel Synthetic Peptides Derived from Indolicidin and Ranalexin against Streptococcus pneumoniae
Literature.Author: Jindal HM, Le CF, Mohd Yusof MY, Velayuthan RD, Lee VS, Zain SM, Isa DM, Sekaran SD

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:100% hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=15.62 µg/ml,Human lung normal epithelial cells NL20:-=NA,Human lung normal epithelial cells NL20:50% Cell death=125 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=7.81–15.62µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=7.81µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=7.81µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=7.81µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 15308(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=>250µg/ml),Citrobacter sp.(MIC=>250µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>250µg/ml)
